alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 10 at 3:28AM MDT until June 12 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 489 BELOW 6500 FEET... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 489 San Rafael Swell. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts in excess of 35 mph Sunday afternoon and evening, and again Monday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Afternoon relative humidity falling into the 6 to 10 percent range, with marginal overnight recovery of only 20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are possible. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is a potential for critical fire weather conditions. Continue to monitor for the latest forecasts and for possible Red Flag Warnings.
